question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. flower
B. sink
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The flower is on the left side of the counter, partially behind a chair, while the sink is directly under the window and closer to the cameraâ€™s viewpoint, making the flower appear further away.
